name: Piet Mondrian Dating Sim
description:
You were set up on a date with Piet Mondrian by your good friend Pablo Picasso. He's cute I guess... but also a huge narcissist? Listen to him ramble about art, and maybe get to know him some more???

(Interpretations of Mondrian works are (mostly) my own - do not use me as a source I am just some guy)

(Also my first visual novel, dating sim, and renpy project :> )
